医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
美国心脏病学会发起新活动以加强低密度脂蛋白诊断筛查美国心脏病学会通过与 Amgen 和 Esperion 的战略合作，正在发起一项新的质量改进活动，“推动 LDL 筛查的紧迫性”，以提高没有既往心脏事件的患者以及那些患有心脏病的患者的诊断性 LDL 筛查率。与已知的心血管疾病一起帮助临床医生根据医疗指南确定需要治疗的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/American-College-of-Cardiology-launches-new-campaign-to-increase-diagnostic-LDL-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/American-College-of-Cardiology-launches-new-campaign-to-increase-diagnostic-LDL-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47cbd59f-5b98-4383-a3ec-0b2030273d0e Tue, 12 Sep 2023 22:18:22 -0400 American College of Cardiology launches new campaign to increase diagnostic LDL screening
研究揭示了改善骨髓瘤治疗的潜在目标新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 新加坡癌症科学研究所 (CSI Singapore) 的研究人员进行的一项开创性研究揭示了组蛋白甲基转移酶 NSD2 及其表观遗传靶点 PKCα 在导致 t(4; 14) 易位的多发性骨髓瘤（MM）（一种血癌的高危亚型）变得更具侵袭性和对治疗具有抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-reveals-pottial-targets-to-improve-the-treatment-of-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Study-reveals-pottial-targets-to-improve-the-treatment-of-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8659b594-82a2-4b7e-8b3e-d3557e36554b Tue, 12 Sep 2023 21:54:10 -0400 Study reveals potential targets to improve the treatment of myeloma
日托机构中的细菌混合物与幼儿喘息有关在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的一项研究表明，日托机构灰尘中发现的特定细菌组合与幼儿喘息有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Mixtures-of-bacteria-in-day-care-facilities-linked-to-wheezing-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Mixtures-of-bacteria-in-day-care-facilities-linked-to-wheezing-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2015d521-b254-44a5-90e3-380cd9761e16 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 21:50:52 -0400 Mixtures of bacteria in day care facilities linked to wheezing in young children
白细胞端粒长度较短可能表明痴呆风险增加《普通精神病学》杂志在线发表的一项大型长期研究结果表明，白细胞染色体末端的端粒较短可能预示着痴呆症风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Shorter-telomere-length-of-leuc cells-may-signal-heightened-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Shorter-telomere-length-of-leuc cells-may-signal-heightened-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8830c85-6f83-4a07-a03d-41ba35b276ce Tue, 12 Sep 2023 21:47:06 -0400 Shorter telomere length of leucocytes may signal heightened dementia risk
能量饮料是否会让您的心脏和思想处于危险之中？综合审查发现能量饮料与一系列健康风险有关，从心律失常到心理健康问题。研究人员呼吁严格控制其消费，特别是未成年人和孕妇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Are-energy-drinks-putting-your-heart-and-mind-at-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Are-energy-drinks-putting-your-heart-and-mind-at-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8df55106-0c84-43bd-927f-a169a067255b Tue, 12 Sep 2023 21:02:00 -0400 Are energy drinks putting your heart and mind at risk?
揭示了 COVID-19 如何针对胰腺该研究揭示了 PLAC8 蛋白在使人类胰腺容易受到 SARS-CoV-2 感染的过程中的作用，从而导致严重的 COVID-19 病例出现胰腺损伤和并发症。这些发现为了解病毒如何影响多个器官系统开辟了新途径，并为未来的治疗提供了潜在的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/How-COVID-19-targets-the-pancreas-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/How-COVID-19-targets-the-pancreas-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3ed95f8-b11b-4e64-aaa1-89310cb221b8 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 20:49:00 -0400 How COVID-19 targets the pancreas revealed
解锁痴呆症的未来：端粒长度可以预测您的风险《普通精神病学》最近的研究发现，白细胞端粒长度（LTL）与患痴呆症，尤其是阿尔茨海默病的风险显着相关。该研究利用超过 430,000 人的数据，表明端粒长度可以作为大脑健康和痴呆风险的预测生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Unlocking-the-future-of-dementia-Your-telomere-length-could-predict-your-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Unlocking-the-future-of-dementia-Your-telomere-length-could-predict-your-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4ef706-a851-416b-807d-d1b46f1b29fe Tue, 12 Sep 2023 20:38:00 -0400 Unlocking the future of dementia: Your telomere length could predict your risk
一年后，许多“轻度”新冠患者仍在与肺部损伤作斗争PLoS ONE 最近的一项研究表明，严重的 COVID-19 患者出现长期肺损伤的风险较高，近一半患者在发病一年后出现肺功能下降。该研究强调需要持续监测以有效管理“长期新冠”症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Many-mild-COVID-病人-still-batdling-lung-damage-a-year-later.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Many-mild-COVID-病人-still-batdling-lung-damage-a-year-later.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=204ac005-08c3-4b51-979a-6b48c0181fa9 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 20:27:00 -0400 Many 'mild' COVID patients still battling lung damage a year later
报告称，医生必须解决帕金森病患者隐藏的耻辱负担根据专门研究帕金森病和其他运动障碍的专家的一份报告，如果不能解决患者的社会排斥、孤立、孤独感和其他耻辱心理影响，即使是帕金森病的最佳治疗方法也是不够的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Doctors-must-address-Parkinsone28099s-病人se28099-hidden-burden-of-stigma-report-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Doctors-must-address-Parkinsone28099s-病人se28099-hidden-burden-of-stigma-report-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8262a662-85e4-4b4d-aa99-326831346a62 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 16:22:51 -0400 Doctors must address Parkinson’s patients’ hidden burden of stigma, report says
成人食物扫盲计划可有效产生饮食行为的积极变化提高食物素养可以积极影响饮食质量并降低患慢性病的风险；然而，对其有效性的证据的解释是有限的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Adult-food-literacy-program- effective-in-making-positive-changes-across-dietary-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Adult-food-literacy-program- effective-in-making-positive-changes-across-dietary-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb9a2336-0ac3-41c1-a95e-c736a59236c9 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 16:13:32 -0400 Adult food literacy program effective in producing positive changes across dietary behaviors
